reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful for low-key weddings, comfortable, and well-fitting, with one noting it's not scratchy at all. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its quality, soft material, and flattering shape. However, opinions about sizing and material quality are mixed - while some find it true to size with nice material, others report sizing issues and express disappointment with the fabric. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress.
items.body: Beautiful dress for a wedding. Suggested I go up a size which was fine. Fit well and comfortable Read more
items.author: Ford Davies

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: Loved this dress, wore to my son's wedding, very elegant. Read more
items.author: Virginia Perez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
items.body: Fit was nice, and overall quality of the dress was good. I wore this as my wedding dress. It was more see-through than I expected, but I wore it and I liked it. Pretty good dress for the price. Material is soft, comfy and not scratchy at all. Read more
items.author: R3MAG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: True to size. I got it for my wedding and it was so comfortable to wear. The material is not so thick but it isn’t so see through. It does stretch pretty well. Overall comfortable and good for the price. Read more
items.author: Lidia

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low quality lace
items.body: Lace did not hold up well after a few washes. Read more
items.author: Felisha Cunningham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: This dress was delivered quickly! The material is super soft and has a stretch to it. It fit my niece perfectly. Only to make it better is if it had pockets. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Horrible
items.body: If I could give this dress no stars I would but unfortunately I can’t. I bought this dress because I liked it and was going to use it for my wedding this year since my wedding was so quick and Amazon or the company sent me the wrong dress. I was so over it! Luckily I was able to buy a different dress again on Amazon and it worked out so much better. Don’t buy the dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but…
items.body: Comfortable but not flattering on a plus sized body Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal V Neck Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Maxi Formal V Neck Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White, Purple, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Apricot, Black, Navy Blue, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
